name: part_007
file: tmp_【#尾丸ポルカ爆誕祭​】激烈モーレツ3D歌ライブパッションバースデー【ホロライブ】 [E2CJV9UqTRM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Omaru Polka finishes her MC segment in a flower field and prepares for the next song.
Omaru Polka performs a cover of 'Shirushi' by LiSA.

subtitles.original: 花に亡霊
subtitles.english: Ghost in a Flower

subtitles.original: 待っていた...
subtitles.english: I was waiting...

subtitles.original: 次の曲です。
subtitles.english: The next song.

subtitles.original: 新しい曲を覚えると
subtitles.english: When I learn a new song,

subtitles.original: 少し
subtitles.english: I get a little bit

subtitles.original:
シルシ
作詞：LiSA / 作曲：カヨコ
subtitles.english:
Shirushi
Lyrics: LiSA / Composition: Kayoko

subtitles.original: 近づいてしまうのが
subtitles.english: closer, and that

subtitles.original: 悔しい。
subtitles.english: is frustrating.

subtitles.original: 照らした
subtitles.english: Illuminated

subtitles.original: 賑やかな笑い声と
subtitles.english: With the bustling laughter

subtitles.original: 路地裏の足跡
subtitles.english: And footprints in the alleyway

subtitles.original: 伝えたい想いはどれだけ届いたんだろう
subtitles.english: How much of the feelings I want to convey reached you?

subtitles.original: いつも振り向いて確かめる
subtitles.english: I always turn around and check

subtitles.original: いつだって迷わず君はきっと
subtitles.english: No matter when, without hesitation, you surely...

subtitles.original: どんな僕も追いかけてくれるから
subtitles.english: Because you'll chase after any version of me

subtitles.original: じっと見つめた君の瞳に
subtitles.english: In your eyes that I gazed into intensely

subtitles.original: 映った僕が生きるシルシ
subtitles.english: Is the sign that the "me" reflected there is alive

subtitles.original: 何度も途切れそうな鼓動を
subtitles.english: The heartbeat that seemed like it would cut out many times

subtitles.original: 強く強く鳴らした
subtitles.english: I made it beat strongly, so strongly

subtitles.original: 今日を越えてみたいんだ
subtitles.english: I want to try and make it past today

subtitles.original: 手にした幸せを失うことを恐れて
subtitles.english: Fearing that I'll lose the happiness I've gained

subtitles.original: 立ち止まっているよりも
subtitles.english: Rather than just standing still

subtitles.original: 一つ一つ大きな
subtitles.english: One by one, big...

subtitles.original: できるだけ多くの笑顔咲かせようと
subtitles.english: Trying to make as many smiles bloom as possible

subtitles.original: 思い出すくらいの通り過ぎた日々が
subtitles.english: So that the days passed that I remember

subtitles.original: いつも輝いて見えるように
subtitles.english: Always look like they're shining

subtitles.original: ぎゅっと握った君の温もりで
subtitles.english: With your warmth that I held onto tightly

subtitles.original: 感じた僕ら繋いだ証
subtitles.english: I felt the proof of our connection

subtitles.original: 君と今同じ空の下
subtitles.english: Under the same sky as you now

subtitles.original: あの日描いた未来を歩いている
subtitles.english: I'm walking the future we envisioned that day

subtitles.original: いくつ願い叶えても
subtitles.english: No matter how many wishes come true

subtitles.original: 君と過ごした新しい明日を
subtitles.english: A new tomorrow spent with you

subtitles.original: すぐに次々に僕はきっとまた願ってしまうから
subtitles.english: I'm sure I'll just keep wishing for them one after another

subtitles.original: 響け
subtitles.english: Echo

subtitles.original: いつか僕らを攫ってくから
subtitles.english: Because it will take us away someday

subtitles.original: 瞬きした隙に君の見せるすべてを
subtitles.english: Everything you show me in the blink of an eye

subtitles.original: 見落とさないように
subtitles.english: So that I don't miss any of it

subtitles.original: じっと見つめた君の瞳に
subtitles.english: In your eyes that I gazed into intensely

subtitles.original: 映った僕が生きるシルシ
subtitles.english: Is the sign that the "me" reflected there is alive

subtitles.original: 何度も途切れそうな鼓動を
subtitles.english: The heartbeat that seemed like it would cut out many times

subtitles.original: 強く強く鳴らした
subtitles.english: I made it beat strongly, so strongly

subtitles.original: 今日を越えて行けなくても 君と生きたい
subtitles.english: Even if I can't make it past today, I want to live with you
